"Moving Blocks":
"About the Teleporter

From here, you can move to another block. When playing with friends, make sure to all gather on the same block.

A block is a place where multiple players gather. Direct communications, such as forming a party, are only possible with players in the same block as you.

For further details, please consult the online manual. Clicking the link below will open a new page in your browser.
"
